install.name: JK-Phoca Categories Display
install.author: Nguyen Duc Phuong for joomlakurse.ch
install.description: Phoca Gallery Module - displays latest categories from Phoca Gallery component. Piclens is supported. Works only with Phoca Gallery installed.

param.name: cat_limit
param.label: Number of Categories
param.description: How many Categories should be displayed?

param.name: pix_randomize
param.label: Randomize category picture
param.description: Every Category has a randomized preview picture if yes. If no the first picture is showed

param.name: show_number
param.label: Show number of pictures
param.description: Shows how many pics are there in a category

param.name: show_title
param.label: Show title of category
param.description: Show the title of the category

param.name: playbutton
param.label: Show Play button
param.description: Display the play button for each box

param.name: piclens
param.label: Ad piclens slideshow
param.description: If yes the piclens slideshow starts / If no the regular lightbox shows up.

param.name: overview
param.label: Show overview link
param.description: If yes the module shows a link to a overview page of the categories

param.name: link_to
param.label: Link category picture to
param.description: Where should category picture link to?
